Grouped_Utterances: I guess I’m just curious about how to deal with those moments when I feel overwhelmed with everything.

Not really. I just end up avoiding things instead. It feels nice. I can see how that could help when I’m feeling overwhelmed.
Well, I’ve been hanging out with my friends more. We’ve been jamming together, and it’s nice to have that support. It definitely lifts me up. I feel less isolated when I’m with them.
